title: BRIEF-Heliospectra To Partner With Nectar Farms In Australia
text:
BRIEF-Heliospectra To Partner With Nectar Farms In Australia

Stock Markets 19 minutes ago (Oct 24, 2019 17:28)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Heliospectra To Partner With Nectar Farms In Australia Oct 24 (Reuters) - Heliospectra AB (publ) : * HELIOSPECTRA TO PARTNER WITH NECTAR FARMS ON MITRA LED LIGHTING SOLUTIONS FOR LARGE SCALE GLASSHOUSE INSTALLATION IN AUSTRALIA * PRODUCTION WILL NOT BE INITIATED UNTIL HELIOSPECTRA RECEIVES DOWN PAYMENT * REVENUE IS EXPECTED DURING SECOND AND Q3 OF 2020 WHEN LIGHTING IS SCHEDULED TO BE SHIPPED AND INSTALLED. * ORDER VALUE IS SEK 72 MILLION AND INCLUDES A DOWN PAYMENT OF 50 PERCENT DURING Q4 2019 * REVENUE IS EXPECTED DURING SECOND AND Q3 OF 2020 WHEN LIGHTING IS SCHEDULED TO BE SHIPPED AND INSTALLED.

BRIEF-Heliospectra To Partner With Nectar Farms In Australia
